mapper.select: SELECT tt.id, tt.talk_id,tt.duration_second, tt.terminal_info,tt.phone_type,tf.src_url from tb_talk_record tt join tb_talk_record_file tf on tt.talk_id = tf.talk_id where tf.src_url !=''
SELECT tt.id, tt.talk_id,tt.duration_second, tt.terminal_info,tt.phone_type,tf.src_url from tb_talk_record tt join tb_talk_record_file tf on tt.talk_id = tf.talk_id where tt.id =#{id}
SELECT tt.id, tt.talk_id,tt.duration_second, tt.terminal_info,tt.phone_type,tf.src_url from tb_talk_record tt join tb_talk_record_file tf on tt.talk_id = tf.talk_id where tf.src_url =#{srcUrl}
